SELECT SEQ_ODR_CODE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER (ODR_CODE, MEM_ID, ODR_NAME, ODR_ZIPCODE, ODR_ADDR, ODR_ADDR_D, ODR_PHONE, ODR_TOTAL_PRICE, ODR_MESSAGE) VALUES (#{odr_code}, #{mem_id}, #{odr_name}, #{odr_zipcode}, #{odr_addr}, #{odr_addr_d}, #{odr_phone}, #{odr_total_price}, #{odr_message})

INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER_DETAIL (ODR_CODE, PDT_NUM, ODR_AMOUNT, ODR_PRICE) SELECT #{odr_code}, C.PDT_NUM, C.CART_AMOUNT, C.CART_AMOUNT * P.PDT_PRICE FROM TBL_CART C INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON C.PDT_NUM = P.PDT_NUM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
